note.p: Birth: London, England, United Kingdom (02 March 1843)
Death: Observatory, Capetown, South Africa, Africa (29 September 1905)
Burial: Naval cemetery, Simonstown, South Africa
Career: Captain, Royal Navy; died of Enteric fever
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1906-1907 vol 78 pp xliv-xlix signed by A M F
References: Margaret B Deacon, 'G. Herbert Fowler (1861-1940): The Forgotten Oceanographer' in NR 1983-84 vol 38 pp 261-296
